articles.title: Eating out to become costlier in Bengaluru as hotel association hikes prices - The Indian Express
articles.description: Bangalore news: "The price of food items at restaurants and eateries will increase by around 10 percent in the next week, " PC Rao, president of the association, told The Indian Express.
articles.content: With prices of edible oils, cooking gas, fuel and other materials surging, Bruhat Bengaluru Hotel Association on Monday has decided to increase prices of food items by 10 percent.“The price of food i… [+1247 chars]

articles.description: HDFC Bank saw the most action on April 4 and was the biggest Nifty50 gainer, rising 10 percent to Rs 1,656.80 on the announcement of HDFC merger
articles.content: The rally on April 4 helped the market rise to a two-and-half-month high backed by broad-based uptrend, positive global cues and the HDFC-HDFC Bank merger announcement. The Sensex reclaimed the 60,00… [+4111 chars]

articles.title: Electricity charges in Karnataka to go up - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Electricity consumers across Karnataka will start paying an additional 35 paise per unit from April 1, effectively paying an additional Rs 20 to Rs 35 or more based on the consumption. The Karnataka Electricity Regulatory Commission (KERC) on Monday approved …
